subject: Info about Haptic reactor
description_text:
Hi,
 I would like to know with what haptic reactor those Pedals comes in :Newest
Simsonn Plus X Simracing Load Cell Pedal with Haptics Reactor.
I'm interested to buy those but only if they come with a linear reactor
like the VM Pro.
Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Francesco Gaeta,    As shown in the image, this pedal does indeed feature the VAM Pro linear reactor.
